name: Blankiball: Der Trinksportsimulator
description:
The gameplay


Experience the legendary German drinking sport as a video game at last. Grab a bottle, aim at the target and lead your team to victory with skillful throws.

Multiplayer


Any game is more fun when you experience it together. And in Blankiball we put special emphasis on an exciting multiplayer mode. Challenge your friends! You can do this online (Beta), but also in local couch multiplayer. So Blankiball is perfectly suitable as a party game. Please note that for local multiplayer each player needs a gamepad.

Features


  • Controller support: Different controllers are supported besides mouse and keyboard.
  • Watch out for dangers: Rowdy skateboarders and aggressive dogs roam the park.
  • Choose your drink: Many different drinks - you have the choice. Which refreshing swill will lead you to victory?
  • Digital Drinks: Blankiball Simulator is a perfect party game where participants have to finish their real drinks as fast as possible. But the game is also suitable for digital events: Put your skills to the test and empty your digital drink faster than everyone else.
  • New levels of consciousness: Watch as you slip to lower levels of perception and the controls become increasingly difficult.
  • Level up! Collect experience points and unlock new abilities.
  • Bottles run out: watch your drink! If you get clumsy, it will run out quickly.
  • Customizable Characters: Choose between different looks
.
